channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Urgent Request for Litter Cleanup in Densole and King Hall Road Area, 24th July
item.description:
I am writing to raise a concern about the ongoing litter problem in the Densole and King Hall Road area. The streets have not been cleaned for over seven weeks, and the accumulation of rubbish has now become a serious health and environmental issue for residents and passers-by. As a local resident, I kindly request that the council take immediate action to organise a thorough sweep and cleanup of the area. The current state of the streets is not only unsightly but also poses risks to public health and safety. I would also appreciate it if the relevant management teams could review the current street cleaning schedule and ensure that regular maintenance is resumed to prevent this issue from recurring. Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your response and to seeing improvements in the area soon.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Frant Close, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stones and gravel on road and public paths, 24th July
item.description:
Stones and gravel have been spilled on the road along Station Road all the way down to the crossroads at Station Road/Faraday Road/Longlands Road. Stones are being flicked up by passing cars onto the pavement and the debris is causing dangerous driving conditions. Can it please be cleared as a matter of urgency, thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Station Road, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet
